programme.title: Hunt for Truth
programme.desc: Carrie Evans uncovers unsettling truths about her family and boss Caswell Foxx while researching a major case.

programme.title: Family in Hiding
programme.desc: Single mother witnesses DA's murder, enters protection with her teens, facing a life-altering ordeal.

programme.title: Knockout

programme.title: Cradle of Lies
programme.desc: Marissa was in a coma while pregnant and wakes up five years later to find that the baby she delivered is gone.

programme.title: Love Served Here
programme.desc: A chef bets she can turn around the worst restaurant in the city but ends up falling for the owner.

programme.title: Love on Your Doorstep
programme.desc: A TV host profiles a local florist’s long-running flower competition in order to land her own show.

programme.title: Tenebre

programme.title: Banana Joe

programme.desc: In the middle of the 16th century, Hideyoshi, a power hungry warlord sets out to destroy the Momochi clan. Spanning decades, the quest for the missing daggers takes Shiranui through war and ancient tradition.

programme.title: Me Before You
programme.desc: Louisa becomes the carer of William, a cold man who has paralysis. They soon fall in love but she is devastated to hear that he does not want to live so she tries to change his mind.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: St. Vincent
programme.desc: Maggie, a working single mother, allows Vincent, a hedonistic misanthrope, to babysit her 12-year-old son Oliver. Soon, a beautiful friendship develops between Vincent and Oliver.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set
programme.desc: The key aspects of filmmaking are explored, with behind-the-scenes insights and intriguing interviews with prominent cast and crew members.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Keith Michaels, an Oscar-winning writer, teaches at the Binghamton University on the East Coast after losing his popularity in Hollywood and falls in love with Holly, a fellow teacher.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace, who is vacationing in Paris with her friends and stepsister, is mistaken for a British heiress. Later, the three women are whisked away to Monte Carlo, where they discover royalty and romance.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: While playing on a cruise ship, the chipmunks and the chipettes take their pranks too far and end up stranded on a tropical island, only to discover it is not as deserted as it seems.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: A neurotic thirty-something woman resolves to finally take control of her life once and for all, while looking for h love.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Eight very different couples and their love lives intertwine during a hectic month before Christmas in London.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After breaking up with Mark, Bridget meets a handsome stranger, Jack. Soon, Bridget finds out that she is pregnant but is unsure about the identity of the father.

programme.title: A Dog's Way Home
programme.desc: When Lucas sends his beloved dog, Bella, far away to safety, she begins an arduous journey across Colorado to be reunited with him.

programme.title: A Dog's Way Home
programme.desc: When Lucas sends his beloved dog, Bella, far away to safety, she begins an arduous journey across Colorado to be reunited with him.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of a demonic serial killer, Edgar Reese. However, questions arise when the murders start again, eerily matching the modus operandi of Reese.

programme.title: Penelope
programme.desc: A young girl hailing from an affluent family embarks on a quest for true love to dispel a curse that has pervaded her family.

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: An exiled squirrel plans to rob a nut store to provide food for his former colony. Unfortunately, the store is also a front for bank robbers.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: Breaking Up
programme.desc: Monica, a schoolteacher, and Steve, a photographer, have been deeply in love for over two years now. However, their impulsive natures often push their fragile relationship into an on-and-off cycle.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: Oren is deliberately mean to the people around him. However, he is forced to change his attitude and take help from his neighbour Leah when he is asked to look after his nine-year-old granddaughter.

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: To find her independence outside the White House, Samantha Mackenzie, daughter of the US President, leaves for college and falls in love with a student who is hiding a secret.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: When an old confidante of a woman reveals about his engagement, she sets off on a journey to sabotage his wedding after realising her love for him.

programme.title: The Vow
programme.desc: Paige meets with a terrible accident which leaves her in a coma. When she wakes up, she doesn't recognise her husband Leo, who then tries to win her back by courting her again.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: With the intention of getting a breast implant, Elizabeth becomes a high school substitute teacher. However, when she learns about a bountiful bonus, she strives to get her students the highest marks.

programme.title: Due Date
programme.desc: Peter Highman must reach Los Angeles to make it in time for his child's birth. However, he is forced to travel with Ethan, an aspiring actor, who frequently lands him in trouble.

programme.title: The Notebook
